III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an MISEP violation. Please note that there
are additional MISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The facility
is in compliance will all additional MISEP requirements except for the following: In
compliance.
3.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a DHHS Contract/Policy violation. Please
note that there are additional DHHS Contract/Policy requirements that may not be
included in section 1. The facility is in compliance will all additional DHHS
Contract/Policy requirements except for the following: In compliance.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas: Mott Children
Center or Optimist House youth that transfer to Zonta House are considered a
placement change and this is documented on the DHHS 69. It is not considered a
foster care closure.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas: None at this time.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Zonta House was not required to submit a corrective action plan during this licensing
period.

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their regular license.
